about.name: Roy Chen
about.education: Asia Eastern University of Science and Technology

introduction.section1: I am a frontend engineer specializing in React, with years of development experience. I have participated in and built multiple projects, gaining expertise in the micro-frontend architecture. I prioritize code maintainability and am committed to writing high-quality, scalable frontend applications.

pentium-network.instruction:
● Built main applications and micro frontend projects using Webpack5 and Module Federation.
● Implemented CI code checks with GitHub Actions.
● Wrote unit tests using Jest and component tests with React Testing Library.
● Implemented multilingual support with i18next.
● Replaced Webpack with Rsbuild for faster builds and adopted Module Federation 2.0.
● Replaced Jest with Vitest for faster test execution.

Projects:
● Developed the "RAPD" product - https://www.pentiumnetwork.com/rapd:
　○ Built a micro frontend architecture using Vite, Webpack5, and Module Federation.
　○ Integrated Auth0 for authentication.
　○ Developed micro apps for RAPD features.

● Developed a Component Library:
　○ Built shared components using Antd, enabling reuse across products and micro frontends to save development time and maintain UI consistency.
　○ Bundled with Rollup and published to the company's private npm server.
　○ Documented components and examples using Storybook.
　○ Designed a Theme & i18n system.
　○ Created a CSS cache mechanism to optimize component styles.
　○ Developed 'Upload', 'UploadModal', 'SelectionArea', and 'SearchFilter' components.

● Designed and developed a Micro Frontends Framework:
　○ Built a micro frontend framework to help developers focus on feature development.
　○ Used MobX for state management between micro apps.
　○ Designed communication interfaces for the main app and micro apps.

● Developed the "create micro app" CLI:
　○ Built a CLI with TypeScript to help developers quickly scaffold micro frontend projects.

● Maintained "MRVN" - https://www.pentiumnetwork.com/mrvn:
　○ Integrated React micro frontends into a Vue app using Webpack5 and Module Federation.
　○ Developed micro apps for MRVN features.

● Maintained "MAVIS" - https://www.pentiumnetwork.com/mavis.

● Maintained "GateOne" (Pentium fork) - https://github.com/liftoff/GateOne:
　○ Fixed cursor and pointer operation bugs in the web terminal emulator.
